titles.title: A bill to temporarily suspend duties on certain composite diagnostic or laboratory reagents.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4254)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1997, the duty on certain composite diagnostic or laboratory reagents.
